room_title: Escape room "Arcade" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: So much fun! Best birthday ever!!! The staff was great and fun! The Arcade was awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Arcade" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: I did the Arcade room as a team builder for work and had a great time. There was a lot to keep us busy for the full hour and we made it out with minutes to spare. The staff were very entertaining and helpful. I'd definitely recommend trying it out.

room_title: Escape room "Arcade" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: We had a BLAST in the Arcade room!! The staff was great. The room was challenging and fun. We will definitely be back!
